item.title: Updated Playlist UI
item.description: The interface for creating Manual and Smart playlists has been redesigned.
item.author: author

item.title: Automatic Video Captions
item.description: Video Cloud Studio can now automatically generate captions for videos.
item.author: author

item.title: Audience Module Renaming
item.description: The Audience module has been renamed as Campaign. This feature update also includes new capabilities.
item.author: author

item.title: New Partner - Wibbitz
item.description: Introducing Brightcoves new partnership with Wibbitz, designed to make it easier for you to create the timely and relevant content your audience wants, on channels they already visit.
item.author: author

item.title: Analytics Filters
item.description: The Performance and Engagement reports now provide the ability to filter the analytics data.
item.author: author

item.title: Studio Rebranding
item.description: The colors and fonts used in Video Cloud Studio have been updated to correspond to the updated Brightcove branding.
item.author: author

item.title: Thumbnail Seeking
item.description: Players can be configured to display video thumbnail images over the player progress bar.
item.author: author

item.title: Multi-language Metadata
item.description: Global companies can now assign a primary language and then add and manage additional metadata languages in Video Cloud.
item.author: author

item.title: Virtual Event Experiences
item.description: A solution that allows organizations to deliver high-quality virtual events featuring bold, interactive experiences.
item.author: author

item.title: Google Analytics Event Tracking
item.description: The Players module provides the ability to easily integrate Brightcove Players with Google Analytics. This allows player events and custom dimension data to be sent to a Google Analytics account for reporting purposes.
item.author: author

item.title: Adobe Analytics Event Tracking
item.description: The Players module provides the ability to easily integrate Brightcove Players with Adobe Analytics. This allows event tracking data to be sent to an Adobe Analytics account for reporting purposes.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Live Event Analytics Dashboard
item.description: The Live module now provides reports on live streaming event or channel performance.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Live Event Monitoring
item.description: The Live module now provides the ability to monitor live events while an event is in progress and for up to 1 hour after the event ends.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Live to Facebook
item.description: The Social module has added support for scheduling and streaming live events to Facebook.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Export Video Metadata
item.description: The Media module now provides the ability to export video metadata to a .csv file.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Redesigned Players Module
item.description: A new player editor (the player details page) is now available. Access to the legacy UI will be available until March 2019. The legacy editor must be used when editing version 5.x players.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Redesigned Live Module
item.description: The Live module has been redesigned with a more robust backend and simplified UI. For information, see Creating and Managing Live Events using the Live Module.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Publish to Gallery Landing Page
item.description: The Media module now offers to ability to publish videos to Gallery landing page experiences. Gallery landing pages can be easily styled and display a lead form to capture viewer information. For more information, see Publishing a Video to Email.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Media Module Saved Search
item.description: The Media module now offers to ability to save search queries you perform. Saved searches can then be easily accessed and re-run. For more information, see How to Search for Videos and Playlists in the Media Module.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Change to Preload Video Setting
item.description: The Preload Video Before User-Initiated Playback setting in the Players module now has a default value of Load video metadata only. For more information, see Configuring Player Settings.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Publish to an In-Page Experience
item.description: The Media module now provides the ability to publish one or more videos, or a playlist, to an in-page experience. In-Page experiences are a feature of the Gallery module. For more information, see Publishing Videos to an In-Page Experience.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Quality Selector in Players Module
item.description: As part of the player properties, you can choose to show a quality selector. This setting controls whether the viewer has the ability to manually select a different rendition as they are watching a video. For more information on the player settings, see Configuring Player Settings.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Force Players to use Latest Pre-release Version
item.description: As part of the player properties, the player version can now be set to "Always latest pre-release" when the update mode is set to automatic. This will cause the player version to be updated to the latest pre-release version (or release version if there is no pre-release version available) automatically as new pre-release versions are available. For more information on the player update mode and version, see Setting the Player Update Mode and Version.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: URL Shortener when Publishing
item.description: When publishing a video to web or email, the Media module now provides the ability to generate a shortened preview URL.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Video Views in Media Module
item.description: The Media module now provides the ability to display the number of video views for the past 30 days in the video list. Selet Views (30 Days) using the column selector. Opening the video properties will display a graph of the video views for the past 30 days.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Improvements to Brightcove Social Auto Sync
item.description: A number of usability improvements have been made to the Auto Sync feature: - Option to ignore inactive videos - Option to match against ANY tag in a list - Option to sync all videos in a Video Cloud account - Added auto-synced videos to the publish stream view - Improved filtering and sorting on auto-sync status page For more information, see Using Auto Sync to Synchronize Videos to Social Media Accounts.
item.author: Brightcove Learning

item.title: Request Ads "on cue point" Setting
item.description: The Advertising panel in the Media module now provides the ability to request ads when cue points are encountered during video playback. For more information, see Configuring Player Advertising.
item.author: Brightcove Learning
